text: Io sono (which means “I am”) is an artwork by the Italian artist Salvatore Garau. == Description == The signature of Salvatore Garau is already a work of art in itself. Garau's invisible works consist of a simple A4 sheet signed by Salvatore Garau. ==Related pages== * In front of you (Garau) * Comedian (artwork) * Fountain (Duchamp) *International Exhibition of Nothing == Bibliography == * Aldo Quinti, Duchamp Invisible, Officina edizioni, 1975. == Other websites == * Artista vende una obra invisible por US$ 18.300 * Le sculture invisibili di Salvatore Garau: metafore del presente 22 Februaro 2021 Category:Sculptures Category:Conceptual art Category:2021 works Category:2020s in art Category:Salvatore Garau Category:Italian artists Category:Contemporary art Category:Installation art
title: Io sono (artwork)
